name: The Wizard Game (itch)
description:
Collect all the potions to move to the next stage. Collect star bits to increase your score. The game will loop when you complete it. Go for the highest score you can!

Can be played with a controller or keyboard. Shift key jumps, up down left and right to move.

This game is inspired by single screen arcade action games like Donkey Kong, Jumpman, and Bill and Ted's Excellent Game Boy Adventure.
I'm planning on updating with a speedrun mode, which will play through the levels once and give you a final time (instead of looping until you die). Please look forward to it.
